website_summaries.verdict: Effective treats at a great price from a popular pet care company.
pros: Made with real salmon, these treats offer a taste most cats love
Pet owners love that the treats are fortified with vitamin D and calcium so the treats are also nutritious
Owners also report that their cats love the taste, keeping their mouths clean and easy task
cons: Not an all-natural option, so there are fillers and by-products in the foundational ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Damn Cat
customer_reviews.text: I've bought my cat over $200 worth of expensive, high quality treats. Little s**t has hated them all, the dog ends up eating them. But these teeth-cleaning salmon-stench junk-food treats are where it is AT. He loves them. Can't get enough. I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack (all flavors are great)
customer_reviews.text: I use these treats to train my cat to do tricks, because she's addicted to them. The basket where I keep them is on a high shelf, and she circles under the shelf, meowing, until I fetch the treats. If she's in another room when I open the package, she comes running. Great treats for clicker training.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Mongoose

customer_reviews.title: These treats seem to actually work!
customer_reviews.text: After crunching on these treats for a year, my cat got a very good dental report from the vet. So I kept buying them until my local stores thought not to stock them anymore. I'm very happy to find them on Amazon so that Zoe can continue to enjoy these treats that apparently help with her teeth and gums. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: BKR

customer_reviews.title: Meow meow meow
customer_reviews.text: My very finicky cat loses his mind for these. It's the only thing that will get him to come to me if he doesn't wanna. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Irishbarc

customer_reviews.title: Dave loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 16-year-old cat loves these things. He meows until I give him some.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Finicky kitty will eat these!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very finicky cat who needs a little dental TLC. She doesn't care very much for her dental formula cat food--or any cat food for that matter. I can give her a couple of the Brushing Bites outside her bowl and a couple on top of the food inside the bowl, and this seems to help her to keep eating. She's gradually getting used to the dental formula food, but I'll continue to give her the Brushing Bites as well since she actually likes these.
customer_reviews.author: ChattaGram

customer_reviews.title: My cat will not eat but my sisters lap-dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: We were using a dry cat food from Purina made for dental care but they stopped making the product. We have tried everything that is for dental care for cats but she won't eat them. I thought because she thinks Meow Mix is a treat she would like this product but she does not :( I really don't know if I can honestly give this product the 1 star I gave it because another cat might like this product just fine. I did give the two bags of Meow Mix Brushing Bites Cat Treats to my sister for her small lap-dog and the dog loved them. So it worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Wish They Were Larger
customer_reviews.text: Cats love them! I do wish they were larger so that cats would be forced to chew them up before swallowing. In fact, I wish all cat kibble were larger for the same reason. Purina makes a dental treat that is larger, but they are not available presently so I tried these. Don't know how effective these will be in keeping teeth clean yet, but, if a cat simply swallows them whole, they can't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Caluthius

customer_reviews.title: Great product and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the big bag.. we always get this one and you pay the same amount for the small bag and this one is the big one... . we went to the vet recently and she said how my cat has such a perfect teeth that we need to keep doing whatever we were doing ... and well what we do is every morning he brushes his teeth with this treats!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Artuz

customer_reviews.title: i can't believe i'm reviewing cat treats ....
customer_reviews.text: but holy crap he loves them. like LOVES them - once i pick up the bag he is going crazy. i can barely put them down before he is trying to eat them. tonight he knocked one a little out of the way and he was mad looking for it and pounced on it when he found it. i give him 5 in the AM and 5 in the PM and he seems very happy. like bizarrely happy. he's never reacted to any treat like this ... he's 17 - we've tried a lot of different treats. so now i'm subscribed to just have them auto-delivered - the price is great! he's happy ... sometimes. he's a cat.
customer_reviews.author: RMD

customer_reviews.title: Not "Meow" but "Meh"
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly my kitties have a discerning palate and rarely like a commercial treat like this. I had high hopes for these, though, because I also bought them the Catit Senses Digger that will hold treats or kibble they can fish out for themselves and they will spend all day dipping for another chicken chunk if you'll keep dropping them in there. Not so with these. They will leave them right in there. They won't eat them individually or even with a bit of tuna juice on them. A non-starter in my house. : (
customer_reviews.author: Coast Guard City CVX

customer_reviews.title: The cats can't eat just one
customer_reviews.text: My cats both love these. I don't know yet if they are keeping plaque off the cats' teeth or not. They see the vet in a couple of weeks and we'll see. I hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: MarshaA

customer_reviews.title: Cat Treats For Dental Hygiene
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is seventeen years old and plays like a kitten, and has perfect teeth and fresh breath. She eats nothing but Purina Cat Chow and Meow Mix Brushing Bites. She loves her treats. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BLW

customer_reviews.title: Warning DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: WARNING 😢😢😢Do not order. Only one packet mailed. Description states 5. Warning. Called for replacement and second box only had one package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Audible Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat will not eat these. She is very good motivated and doesn’t care for these. Every cat is going to have their own preference though. They are pretty hard which I think may be what she doesn’t like.
customer_reviews.author: This Girl

customer_reviews.title: Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.text: My cat 18 years old will not eat this Meow Mix. I didn’t think I could send it back but if possible I would like a refund. I am giving it to my neighbors and maybe they will want to order it. Otherwise I would like a refund. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: J Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These are useless--one of my cats won't eat them and the other one swallows them whole. I'll use them as regular treats until they're gone but they offer zero dental benefit. Instead I just have a bag of the most ridiculously expensive cat treats in the history of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Marti R

customer_reviews.title: Bailey will eat these
customer_reviews.text: Meow Mix dental treats. I've tried several "dental treats". this one my 15 year old cat will eat. Others, not. Good for her teeth, so glad Bailey likes these.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My do actually liked these better than any of the cats and really ...
customer_reviews.text: My do actually liked these better than any of the cats and really my many cats but mainly the ones I am trying to keep up with their teeth like the Greenie's better but these are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Treats For Kittys Teeth
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves these brushing bite treats! They are really well priced for how many bags you get! They are really keeping my kitts teeth a lot cleaner so I feel good about giving her these healthy treats for my kitty's teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Kitten

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued?
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats but they are getting harder to find instore so I was happy that Amazon had them- but now when I want to reorder them they are not in stock- please don't discontinue these!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Cat brushing bits treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats love there treats. They are fresh and good size. Price wasn't to bad, 5 oz short from what I paid at our Grocery Outlet (3.99 on the left) (3.00 on the right). Either way I'll be getting them again. Because my cats love them...
customer_reviews.author: DarkReader

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I have the snobbiest cat, who doesn't give attention to much, but she will slowly saunter over if I pull this packet out, stare indignantly until I give her as many as she wants....
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i buy this item then i see the date is 10/6/2017 ! she is expire !! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Aseel

customer_reviews.title: My cat Loves, Loves, Loves, Loves, Loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves loves loves loves loves these treats. If he had his way I wouldn't need to buy him dry food ever again! But he still wants his canned food too lol.
customer_reviews.author: path66002

customer_reviews.title: Absurd swing in value
customer_reviews.text: The 4.75 ounce bag was only three bucks a month ago, now it is 8 bucks. One star for the almost 200% price increase. Shameful.
customer_reviews.author: MelMarcial

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved.
customer_reviews.text: We currently have 3 cats, they all love the product, we give it once a day, same time every day and they are lined up for it at correct time. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My cats come running from wherever they are when I open this! One of them is fiend for treats, the other one not so much, but he comes in a hurry to eat these also.
customer_reviews.author: Alana546

customer_reviews.title: my cats like them
customer_reviews.text: All 3 cats of mine like the treats. The effect on their teeth is yet to be determined. But at least the cats are really eager to eat the treats. That's the right first step. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Y. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them and they actually help
customer_reviews.text: I got these mainly for my cat who while not having any actual dental issues, has really stinky breath, but the other one loves them as well. Great price
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: My finicky cat loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: Beckka couldn't get enough of these treats. She was so excited as she stuck her nose in the barely opened bag.I hope they clean her teeth . She had to be reminded to chew!
customer_reviews.author: hoteggs

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a VERRRRYYYY picky eater, ive so much money on different treats for his teeth and he just wont budge. He gobbled these down in seconds and even attacked the bag for more!!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Our Cat Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: If your cat likes these Brushing Bites as much as ours, you will have no trouble getting your cat to eat them. I recommend this product. I could not find it at the Target or Walmart store.
customer_reviews.author: Joel W.

customer_reviews.title: My cat won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: Sadly my cat won’t eat it so it can’t protect his teethT_T He liked the previous one I bought from Walmart which is even cheaper than this one. Two stars because maybe other cats like it...
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Hates These
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, my cat tried these once, and promptly vomited. I tried a couple more times, but he will not eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these things
customer_reviews.text: My cat would eat a diet of nothing but Brushing Bites if we let her. We don't, of course, but she eats them like they're going out of style.
customer_reviews.author: JMBass

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if these treats really do help my cat's teeth, but I must say that both of them love these bed time snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to read.

customer_reviews.title: My Cat LOVES these treats
customer_reviews.text: My Mom recommended these treats, and I am so glad she did. My cat loves these treats, and buying them via Amazon is economical as well as convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Self cleaning tasty bits that help keep you cats teeth clean.
customer_reviews.text: My Tuger is mad about Meow Mix with brushing tasty treats. They help keep his teeth clean Plus he loves the chicken flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves These Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these... Not sure how much they help w/ his breath & teeth but my cat is a very picky eater & only recently started eating cat treats. So he likes these in the chicken and the salmon flavor
customer_reviews.author: janisjop13

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My Cat loves them and sometimes he can be picky. Shared with a friend who's cat is always picky about what she will eat and her cat loves them too. Have purchased them again. Wish Amazon carried more than one flavor
customer_reviews.author: Tamala J Hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats love these! Don't know how I can judge whether are actually helping with tartar, but can't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to clean my cat's teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I am hesitant to take my cat to the vet to have his teeth cleaned. I have always given my cat's "tartar control" treats, four or five a day, and they apparently had no problems with their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: B. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these and the price is amazing for what you get. At the supermarket I pay almost as much for 3 times less
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good treat!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cat's love these, the others won't eat them. I like that they are good for their teeth.

customer_reviews.title: excellent

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it really does anything for cleaning her teeth, but she likes to chase the treats across the room.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these things! They’re a nice size to get him to chase. Fun for us both!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treats
customer_reviews.text: Both cats love these, but one is fat & the other is on prednisolone so he's always hungry so they really like any treats. Doubt they will do much for their teeth, but one can just pretend they will help the teeth!

customer_reviews.title: Delivery fast

customer_reviews.title: My cat is addicted!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is addicted to these!! She loves them. So much so that she actually tore into the bag one day when I wasn’t looking so she could help herself. They now reside in a Tupperware container so she can’t break into them. These are her favorite treats ever.

customer_reviews.title: did not receive 5 pouches

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitty dental care

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes them

customer_reviews.title: Cat treats

customer_reviews.title: This product apparently works the way I expected it to.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to keep my cat's teeth clean as well as his breath and it does just that--in addition to being a treat that he enjoys with his food.

customer_reviews.title: I have 6 cats of all sizes and ages. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 cats of all sizes and ages. The moment they hear this bag rattle, I become the center of attention. I have noticed the difference in their teeth. My 6 cats voted for 5 stars!

customer_reviews.title: Good price

customer_reviews.title: Babbette loves these tasty treats!!

product_meta.title: Meow Mix Brushing Bites Dental Cat Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Salmon| Size:(5) 9 Oz. PouchesHelping care for your cat’s teeth has never been easier or more delicious with Meow Mix brushing Bites, bursting with the tasty flavors your cat will love! These crunchy treats are specially designed to help keep your cats’ teeth clean by reducing plaque and tartar when fed daily. They are fortified with vitamin d and calcium to help support strong teeth and bones so you can feel good about treating every day!
feature_bullets: Made With Real Salmon Your Cat Craves
Specially Designed To Help Clean Cats’ Teeth By Reducing Plaque And Tartar
Fortified With Vitamin D And Calcium To Help Support Strong Teeth And Bones
